website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy, lightweight umpire mask that can also be used as a catcher's mask.
pros: A steel cage that is dipped in rubber makes this mask very sturdy
Absorbent synthetic inner keeps you comfortable
cons: A little heavier than other lightweight brands at 26 ounces

customer_reviews.title: Light but heavier that originally thought.
customer_reviews.text: The Shipping Weight: 12.5 ounces but the actual weight of the face mask is over 26 ounces. It feels light and I compared it to my old Rawlings with a shipping weight of 2.2 pounds and it felt like 3 or 4 pounds after a game. I assumed with a shipping weight of 12.2 oz that the actual weight would be closer to 9oz. It is a good mask and I have worn it nearly everyday this week for over 2 hours each day, but I wish it was as advertised which is why I'm giving it 3 stars instead of 5.
customer_reviews.author: John an Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Headpiece too wide
customer_reviews.text: Great mask but head piece was too wide for wearing a hat underneath. Had to switch out my old headpiece in its place.
customer_reviews.author: Constance Wellik

customer_reviews.title: More than I like. Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I bit heavy. More than I like. Does the job. Product is definitely heavyweight and very sturdy. No quality issues. Three stars because of weight.
customer_reviews.author: romansoldier

customer_reviews.title: Worth the low price
customer_reviews.text: I can't complain about this mask, it is a good inexpensive option. The pads in it are not great and are somewhat abrasive on the face. I switched them out with some of the Wilson memory foam pads when I got the mask and it is much better now. I would recommend this mask.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleb7891

customer_reviews.title: Great Protection
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this mask for a few weeks now and have taken some pretty hard direct hits. The mask really absorbs contact well. I am very comfortable hanging in and focusing on the pitch without having to worry about being hurt by a ball fouled back to my face. It is a little warmer than some of the lighter, less-padded masks, but for protection and safety I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Holli

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I umpire little league and I've taken plenty of foul balls off the mask. It's held up exceptionally well and it's decently comfortable, you can't go wrong with this.
customer_reviews.author: Elias Martinez Jr.

customer_reviews.title: A Great Mask For The Cost!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mask as an upgrade from a different brand because of the Wilson name and price and couldn't be happier. It's a great mask,light weight and very comfortable and it allows a wide range of vision. If you're looking for a good mask at a reasonable price, buy this one. With regards to the picture, the pads are black but that didn't matter to me at all.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen A. Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Not as light as you’d expect but it is very durable and gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for college umpiring. I do wish it was just a tab bit lighter but it’s not too heavy and it is very sturdy and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sean McHugh

customer_reviews.title: Note "Lite" - First foul ball bent productive bar
customer_reviews.text: Wilson has higher grade products that I have heard positive feedback for. In the pre-season this year - first time I used this mask I took a foul ball the the mask on the right hand side of mask and dented the bar! Not the safest product - not happy with my $60 investment. It is also very heavy and after a double header your neck begins to tire.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: GREAT MASK
customer_reviews.text: A great price and a great mask. I umpire kids that are 12-16 and I have taken many off the mask and they are like bugs hitting me. It is a great mask and I highly recomend this product. Pads come off easy and put back on easy. Also a very light mask. Perfect! If you are thinking about getting one don't think twice!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would have been lighter than it was. It is just a little to heavy.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES PENDOLA

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: like it and works well but for 20 bucks you can get a heck lot lighter
customer_reviews.author: Austin Molinich

customer_reviews.title: Great Mask
customer_reviews.text: I've used this mask for four seasons, working all levels of baseball from 10 year-olds. to high-level American Legion. This mask can take anything and fits comfortably on the face. I've taken what were probably 80+ mph shots on this mask with no pain or damage. It may be a little heavier than some masks, but it has never been bent or dinged when taking the high-speed hits as many of the lighter weight masks do, so I consider this a pretty good trade-off.
customer_reviews.author: EJJ

customer_reviews.title: Umpire mask
customer_reviews.text: Nice lightweight mask, but only for youth age games. Not enough weight and protection for older age groups and games. You could really feel fouls ball off the mask if thrown by older age kids. Definitely for young and teens up to about 14 or 15.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Kulovitz

customer_reviews.title: Solid mask
customer_reviews.text: This mask is great. It is light weight and comfortable. I give pitching lessons and I can still talk/coach with it on.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Rutter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very lite and has taken many foul tips in this short period of time. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Tim B.

customer_reviews.title: Great catchers mask
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent catchers mask for the money. It is a little heavy, But does the job well. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Joby

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I took the mask out of the package I put it on and it was SO comfortable. The only thing that is different in the picture is the padding color. The whole mask is black. The MLB logo is on the back of the straps (If it matters to you). The straps are adjustable sliders. Great mask, and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, lite
customer_reviews.text: On Time, what I was looking for. Good fit, lite.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: catcher's mask
customer_reviews.text: My son is a high school catcher who uses this mask and really likes it. It is strong and durable, the pads inside are good quality. The mask feels light but protects the face well. No complaints about this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: baseball dad

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Solid, but MUCH heavier than I expected for something labeled "Dyna-Lite."
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Mask
customer_reviews.text: Good weight and visibility. Easy to adjust.Offers very good protection This is an excellent mask and I recommend it to any umpires out there..
customer_reviews.author: Cliff Harvey

customer_reviews.title: What a great mask
customer_reviews.text: I previously had a "Diamond" brand mask. This is a great mask for varsity softball. I have taken a couple of direct hits off the mask with no issues whatsoever. I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: RHughes7881

customer_reviews.title: Not as light as I had hoped. Possibly because ...
customer_reviews.text: Not as light as I had hoped. Possibly because of the difference between Steel and Aluminum. I currentlu use a Diamond mask which I bought for a similar price but the Diamond is much lighter. I will be returning the mask. The "Dyna Lite" name throws you off.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon R.

product_meta.title: Wilson Dyna-Lite Umpire and Catcher's Face Mask
product_meta.description: Wilson's Dyna-Lite Steel Umpire Facemask with Synthetic Pads features a high profile steel cage with a polyurethane-coated finish for outstanding front-impact protection. It includes interchangeable and non-wrap pads for easy maintenance and a closer fit. - High profile, steel cage with rubber dipped finish - Wrap around padding for maximum shock absorption - Absorbent synthetic inner pads with a PU exterior - Interchangeable pads
feature_bullets: Pad Material - Absorbent synthetic inner, PU outer

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
